sentences.sContent: Seeing him coming,the pony began to fling out.
sentences.sContent_eng: Seeing him coming,the pony began to fling out.
sentences.sCn: 那匹小马看到他进来就开始又踢又跳。

sentences.sContent: My guess is that after years of being the trick pony, he wanted to see what it was like to be the ringmaster.
sentences.sContent_eng: My guess is that after years of being the trick pony, he wanted to see what it was like to be the ringmaster.
sentences.sCn: 在我看来，可能是当了这么多年会变戏法的小马之后，他现在很想看看当马戏团主事什么感觉。
